column3:

mandatory in the drought-stricken state of California. "As Californians, we
have to pull together and save water in every way we can," he said. But if the
four-year drought continues, conservation alone - at least what's required by
the governor's plan - won't fix the problem. Across California, communities
are examining all options to avoid running out of water. Some, like the
